explanation: If problems arise, or something is unclear you can:
manual: access the user documentation of the 3d-learning environment
bug: report a bug (by creating a new Github issue)
logData: download the log to attach it to your bug report
manualToolTip: Opens the user documentation of the 3d-learning environment in a new
bugToolTip: Opens the online form for reporting bugs in a new browser tab
logToolTip: Export a text file with logs. Attach it to your bug report
